SiNVICT
=======

# Available modules


The overview below shows which SiNVICT installations are available per HPC-UGent Tier-2 cluster, ordered based on software version (new to old).

To start using SiNVICT, load one of these modules using a `module load` command like:

```shell
module load SiNVICT/1.0-20180817-GCC-9.3.0
```
